title: Update license texts of dual-licensed libraries to conform to "resolved" ASF cases
description:
As per discussion on the mailing list, we have a few dependencies with multiple conflicting licenses. The resolution ASF made is to pick one of the licenses and use that. 

https://www.apache.org/legal/resolved.html#mutually-exclusive

In particular, we depend on CDDL/GPL licenses and we should pick CDDL.

https://www.apache.org/legal/resolved.html#category-b

comments.author: Dawid Weiss
comments.content: I also updated CDDL 1.0 to CDDL 1.1 where the dependencies called for it. CDDL 1.1 is not OSI-approved but accepted by the ASF (see resolved page above).
